name: Jump! Jump! Jump!
description: Jump! Jump! Jump! is a score based platformer game, it required all your reflexes and concentration to beat the highest score and collect coins to unlock new character!
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL Compatible Video card Storage: 40 MB available space
